body.bibl: Gwilliam, George Henry. “The Ammonian Sections, Eusebian Canons, and Harmonizing Tables in the Syriac Tetraevagelium, with Notices of Peshitto and Other MSS. Which Exhibit These Accessories of the Text.” In Studia Biblica et Ecclesiastica: Essays Chiefly in Biblical and Patristic Criticism by Members of the University of Oxford, 2:241–72. Oxford: Clarendon Press, 1890.

George Henry Gwilliam, The Ammonian Sections, Eusebian Canons, and Harmonizing Tables in the Syriac Tetraevagelium, with Notices of Peshitto and Other MSS.
